summary:
The code defines a StreamResponse class in the aiohttp library, which handles HTTP responses. It includes functionality for setting response headers, handling compression, managing cookies, and generating JSON responses. The class also provides methods for setting the response status, reason, and body content. The code imports various modules and defines constants and helper functions used throughout the implementation.

The code defines a `StreamResponse` class within the aiohttp library, which is used to manage HTTP responses. It provides functionality for setting response headers, handling compression, managing cookies, and generating JSON responses. The class also includes methods for setting the response status, reason, and body content. Various modules are imported, and constants and helper functions are defined for use throughout the implementation.
